text: Elias John Kwandikwa (1 July 1966 â€“ 2 August 2021) was a Tanzanian politician. He was a member of the Chama Cha Mapinduzi. From 2015 until his death, Kwandikwa was a member of the National Assembly. He was also Minister of Defence from 2020 until 2021. Kwandikwa was born in Kahama, Tanzania. Kwandikwa died on 2 August 2021 in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania at the age of 55. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Tanzanian politicians
title: Elias John Kwandikwa
